Title: Enacts the "appropriate appropriations act"; repealer
Summary: Enacts the "appropriate appropriations act" to prohibit lump sum budget appropriations and require itemized appropriations; limits the use of expenditures for emergencies; limits reappropriations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring itemized appropriations and prohibiting lump sum appropriations in the budget; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
